page.title: 04KINGSTON FARM,KNEESALL.
page.content: Mr Hurt has got 205 cows and 55 heifers.He owns 180 cows in calf, 42 heifers in calf,55 young stock,and 53 beef.The farm has 62 fields and 1200 acres,of which 235 acres are {grass}and 150 acres are{barley,}with 630 acres of{wheat}and 180 acres of {rape.}The silage pit can hold 3,000 tons and a cow eats ten tons a year.He grows Perennial rye grass,Italian, Meltra, RVP{rye grass}and{white {clover.}In wheat,Kingston farm grows different winter wheats namely Fenmen,Norman, Galahad and Mission.In barley,Kingston farm grows Sonya,Igri and Panda types of winter barley. {Oilseed Rape}is of the species Bienvenue and Rafel.They feed the cows on silage,Maizegluten,sugar beet pulp,cowcake,and Fodderbeet.In the summer they feed grass and hay.
